level.text: An aggrieved person, as defined in Rule 100.2(a), may protest to the Board a solicitation issued by or for a District contracting agency for the procurement of property or services, or a proposed award, or the award of such a contract.
Authority: District of Columbia Procurement Practices Act of 1985, as amended, D.C. Code §§ 1-1189.1 through 1-1189.8 (Supp. 1997).
